00003 /**
00004  * @brief Helper class.
00005  * 
00006  * The helper class is used to preform many common functions that
00007  * do not necessarily belong in other classes.
00008  * 
00009  * @class       Boo_Helper
00010  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00011  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00012  * @copyright   2009 David Singer
00013  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00014  * @version     2.0.1
00015  */
00016 
00017 class Boo_Helper {
00018 
00019     /**
00020      * @brief Returns the given lower case and underscored word as a Pascal case word.
00021      * 
00022      * @param string $underscoredWord Word to convert.
00023      * @return string Pascal case word. LikeThis.
00024      * @copyright Copyright 2005-2008, Cake Software Foundation, Inc. (http://www.cakefoundation.org)
00025      * @license http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php The MIT License
00026      * @since 2.0.0
00027      */
00028     public static function toPascalCase($underscoredWord) {
00029         return str_replace(' ', '', ucwords(str_replace('_', ' ', $underscoredWord)));
00030     }
00031     
00032     /**
00033      * @brief Returns the given lower case and underscored word as a lower camel caseed word.
00034      * 
00035      * @param string $underscoredWord Word to convert.
00036      * @return string Lower camel case word. likeThis.
00037      * @since 2.0.0
00038      */
00039     public static function toCamelCase($underscoredWord) {
00040         $tmp = self::toPascalCase($underscoredWord);
00041         
00042         if (strlen($tmp) > 0) {
00043             $tmp[0] = strtolower($tmp[0]);
00044             
00045         }
00046         return $tmp;
00047     }
00048     
00049     /**
00050      * @brief Returns the given word as an underscored word.
00051      * 
00052      * @param string $camelCase Camel cased word to be underscorized.
00053      * @return string Underscored version of the camel case word. like_this.
00054      * @copyright Copyright 2005-2008, Cake Software Foundation, Inc. (http://www.cakefoundation.org)
00055      * @license http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php The MIT License
00056      * @since 2.0.0
00057     */
00058     public static function toUnderscoreCase($camelCase) {
00059         return strtolower(preg_replace('/(?<=\\w)([A-Z])/', '_\\1', $camelCase));
00060     }
00061     
00062     /**
00063      * @brief Returns given string in filename case.
00064      * 
00065      * @return The string in filename case. like_this or like-this.
00066      * @param string $mixedCase The string to convert.
00067      * @since 2.0.5
00068      */
00069     public static function toFilenameCase($mixedCase) {
00070         $string = self::toUnderscoreCase($mixedCase);
00071         return $string;
00072     }
00073     
00074     /**
00075      * @brief Adds http://.
00076      * 
00077      * Adds http:// to the \c $url. If https:// or http:// is present then the original \c $url is returned.
00078      * 
00079      * @param string $url The url. 
00080      * @return string The formatted url.
00081      */
00082     public static function addHttp($url) {
00083         // adds http:// if absent
00084         // if the url starts with https:// nothing is done
00085         if ((strtolower(substr($url, 0, 7)) != 'http://') && (strtolower(substr($url, 0, 8)) != 'https://')) {
00086             return 'http://' . $url;
00087         } else {
00088             return $url;
00089         }
00090     }
00091     
00092     /**
00093      * @brief Adds https://.
00094      * 
00095      * Adds https:// to the \c $url. If http:// is present, it is replaced with https://.
00096      * 
00097      * @param string $url The url. 
00098      * @return string The formatted url.
00099      */
00100     public static function addHttps($url) {
00101         // add https:// if absent
00102         if (strtolower(substr($url, 0, 8)) != 'https://') {
00103             if ((strtolower(substr($url, 0, 7)) == 'http://')) {
00104                 $url = substr($url, 7); // remove http://
00105             }
00106             
00107             return 'https://' . $url;
00108         } else {
00109             return $url;
00110         }
00111     }
00112     
00113     /**
00114      * @brief Returns state name.
00115      * 
00116      * @param string $code The state code. 
00117      * @return string The state name.
00118      */
00119     public static function getStateNameByCode($code) {
00120         $code = strtoupper($code);
00121         if (isset(Boo_Validator::$states[$code])) {
00122             return Boo_Validator::$states[$code];
00123         } else { 
00124             trigger_error("State code {$code} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00125             return false;
00126         }
00127     }
00128     
00129     /**
00130      * @brief Returns state code.
00131      * 
00132      * @param string $name The state name.
00133      * @return string The state code.
00134      */
00135     public static function getStateCodeByName($name) {
00136         $name = strtolower(trim($name));
00137         
00138         $states = array_map('strtolower', Boo_Validator::$states);
00139         
00140         $key = $arraySearch($states, $name);
00141         if ($key) {
00142             return $key;
00143         } else { 
00144             trigger_error("State name {$name} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00145             return false;
00146         }
00147     }
00148     
00149     /**
00150      * @brief Returns country name.
00151      * 
00152      * @param string $code The country code. 
00153      * @return string The country name.
00154      */
00155     public static function getCountryNameByCode($code) {
00156         $code = strtoupper($code);
00157         if (isset(Boo_Validator::$countries[$code])) {
00158             return Boo_Validator::$countries[$code];
00159         } else { 
00160             trigger_error("Country code {$code} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00161             return false;
00162         }   
00163     }
00164     
00165     /**
00166      * @brief Removes non numeric characters.
00167      * 
00168      * Removes all characters except [0123456789] from a string.
00169      * 
00170      * @param string $string The string.
00171      * @return string The formated string.
00172      */
00173     public static function removeNonNumeric($string) {
00174         $string = preg_replace('%[^0-9]%', '', $string);
00175         return $string;
00176     }
00177     
00178     /**
00179      * @brief Removes non decimal characters.
00180      * 
00181      * Removes all characters except [0123456789.] from a string.
00182      * 
00183      * @param string $string The string. 
00184      * @return string The formated string.
00185      */
00186     public static function removeNonDecimal($string) {
00187         $string = preg_replace('%[^0-9\.]%', '', $string);
00188         return $string;
00189     }
00190     
00191     /**
00192      * @brief Removes the currency symbol.
00193      * 
00194      * You must correctly set \c BOO_CURRENCY_SYMBOL in your config file for this function to work.
00195      * 
00196      * @param string $price The price.
00197      * @return string The formated price.
00198      */
00199     public static function removeCurrencySymbol($price) {
00200         $price = trim($price);
00201         if (substr($price, 0, 1) == BOO_CURRENCY_SYMBOL) {
00202             $price = substr($price, 1);
00203         }
00204         return $price;
00205     }
00206     
00207     /**
00208      * @brief Returns file extension.
00209      * 
00210      * Updated to use PHP function \c pathinfo() instead.
00211      * If the file is a backup file (ends in a tilde) then a tilde
00212      * is returned regardles of extension.
00213      * 
00214      * @param string $filename The filename.
00215      * @return string The file extension. If no file extension is included NULL returned, FALSE on error.
00216      */
00217     public static function getFileExtension($filename) {
00218             if ($filename == null) {
00219                 trigger_error('Filename can not be null', E_USER_NOTICE);
00220                 return false;
00221             }
00222             
00223             $pathParts = pathinfo($filename);
00224             $ext = isset($pathParts['extension']) ? $pathParts['extension'] : null;
00225             
00226             if (substr($filename, -1) == '~') {
00227                 // backup file
00228                 $ext = '~';
00229             }
00230             
00231             return $ext;
00232     }
00233     
00234     /**
00235      * @brief Returns a unique MD5 string.
00236      * 
00237      * @return string Unique MD5 string.
00238      */
00239     public static function getUniqueMd5() {
00240         return hash('md5', uniqid(mt_rand(), true));
00241     }
00242     
00243     /**
00244      * @brief Generates a Universally Unique IDentifier, version 4.
00245      * 
00246      * @see http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4122.txt
00247      * @see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UUID
00248      * @return string A UUID, made up of 32 hex digits and 4 hyphens.
00249      */
00250     public static function getUuid() {
00251         return sprintf('%04x%04x-%04x-%04x-%04x-%04x%04x%04x',
00252             mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff),
00253             mt_rand(0, 0x0fff) | 0x4000,
00254             mt_rand(0, 0x3fff) | 0x8000,
00255             mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff));
00256     }
00257 }
